summary: The diff implements comprehensive backend connection error handling, health checks, and error recovery mechanisms. All five requirements appear to be addressed with extensive logging, user-friendly error messages, retry functionality, and a new admin session management system. The implementation includes a ping() health check method, error classification utilities, and careful state management for actor readiness.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin session token management system with sessionStorage-based persistence
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on fixing backend connection errors and eliminating runtime errors. The addition of an admin session token system (useAdminSession, adminSession.ts, AdminAccessRecovery component) appears to be a new authentication/authorization feature not requested in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin bootstrap mutation hook with initialize() backend method
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention implementing an admin bootstrap or initialization system. The useAdminBootstrap hook and related initialize() backend call appear to be new features added beyond fixing the connection error.
